content.question: In the final paragraph, the sentence “The red percussion of their fires could be seen night and day by those waiting in the dark trance of the frozen town” serves to highlight contrasts between all of the following EXCEPT

choices.label: the sound of the fires and the silence of the town
the brightness of the fires and the darkness of the night
the warmth of the fires and the frigidness of the air
the vulnerability of wildlife and the resilience of humans

content.answer: the vulnerability of wildlife and the resilience of humans

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain the function of contrasts within a text.
